t: To the chief Musician{H5329}{(H8764)}, A Psalm{H4210} of David{H1732}. In thee, O LORD{H3068}, do I put my trust{H2620}{(H8804)}; let me never{H408}{H5769} be ashamed{H954}{(H8799)}: deliver{H6403}{(H8761)} me in thy righteousness{H6666}.
Bow down{H5186}{(H8685)} thine ear{H241} to me; deliver{H5337}{(H8685)} me speedily{H4120}: be thou my strong{H4581} rock{H6697}, for an house{H1004} of defence{H4686} to save{H3467}{(H8687)} me.
For thou art my rock{H5553} and my fortress{H4686}; therefore for thy name's{H8034} sake lead{H5148}{(H8686)} me, and guide{H5095}{(H8762)} me.
Pull me out{H3318}{(H8686)} of the net{H7568} that{H2098} they have laid privily{H2934}{(H8804)} for me: for thou art my strength{H4581}.
Into thine hand{H3027} I commit{H6485}{(H8686)} my spirit{H7307}: thou hast redeemed{H6299}{(H8804)} me, O LORD{H3068} God{H410} of truth{H571}.
I have hated{H8130}{(H8804)} them that regard{H8104}{(H8802)} lying{H7723} vanities{H1892}: but I trust{H982}{(H8804)} in the LORD{H3068}.

I will be glad{H1523}{(H8799)} and rejoice{H8055}{(H8799)} in thy mercy{H2617}: for thou hast considered{H7200}{(H8804)} my trouble{H6040}; thou hast known{H3045}{(H8804)} my soul{H5315} in adversities{H6869};
And hast not shut me up{H5462}{(H8689)} into the hand{H3027} of the enemy{H341}{(H8802)}: thou hast set{H5975}{(H8689)} my feet{H7272} in a large room{H4800}.
Have mercy{H2603}{(H8798)} upon me, O LORD{H3068}, for I am in trouble{H6887}{(H8804)}: mine eye{H5869} is consumed{H6244}{(H8804)} with grief{H3708}, yea, my soul{H5315} and my belly{H990}.

For my life{H2416} is spent{H3615}{(H8804)} with grief{H3015}, and my years{H8141} with sighing{H585}: my strength{H3581} faileth{H3782}{(H8804)} because of mine iniquity{H5771}, and my bones{H6106} are consumed{H6244}{(H8804)}.

I was a reproach{H2781} among all mine enemies{H6887}{(H8802)}, but especially{H3966} among my neighbours{H7934}, and a fear{H6343} to mine acquaintance{H3045}{(H8794)}: they that did see{H7200}{(H8802)} me without{H2351} fled{H5074}{(H8804)} from me.
I am forgotten{H7911}{(H8738)} as a dead man{H4191}{(H8801)} out of mind{H3820}: I am like a broken{H6}{(H8802)} vessel{H3627}.

For I have heard{H8085}{(H8804)} the slander{H1681} of many{H7227}: fear{H4032} was on every side{H5439}: while they took counsel{H3245}{(H8736)} together{H3162} against me, they devised{H2161}{(H8804)} to take away{H3947}{(H8800)} my life{H5315}.
But I trusted{H982}{(H8804)} in thee, O LORD{H3068}: I said{H559}{(H8804)}, Thou art my God{H430}.
My times{H6256} are in thy hand{H3027}: deliver{H5337}{(H8685)} me from the hand{H3027} of mine enemies{H341}{(H8802)}, and from them that persecute{H7291}{(H8802)} me.
Make thy face{H6440} to shine{H215}{(H8685)} upon thy servant{H5650}: save{H3467}{(H8685)} me for thy mercies{H2617}' sake.

Let me not be ashamed{H954}{(H8799)}, O LORD{H3068}; for I have called{H7121}{(H8804)} upon thee: let the wicked{H7563} be ashamed{H954}{(H8799)}, and let them be silent{H1826}{(H8799)} in the grave{H7585}.
Let the lying{H8267} lips{H8193} be put to silence{H481}{(H8735)}; which speak{H1696}{(H8802)} grievous{H6277} things proudly{H1346} and contemptuously{H937} against the righteous{H6662}.

Oh how great{H7227} is thy goodness{H2898}, which thou hast laid up{H6845}{(H8804)} for them that fear{H3373} thee; which thou hast wrought{H6466}{(H8804)} for them that trust{H2620}{(H8802)} in thee before the sons{H1121} of men{H120}!

Thou shalt hide{H5641}{(H8686)} them in the secret{H5643} of thy presence{H6440} from the pride{H7407} of man{H376}: thou shalt keep them secretly{H6845}{(H8799)} in a pavilion{H5521} from the strife{H7379} of tongues{H3956}.
Blessed{H1288}{(H8803)} be the LORD{H3068}: for he hath shewed me his marvellous{H6381}{(H8689)} kindness{H2617} in a strong{H4692} city{H5892}.

For I said{H559}{(H8804)} in my haste{H2648}{(H8800)}, I am cut off{H1629}{(H8738)} from before{H5048} thine eyes{H5869}: nevertheless{H403} thou heardest{H8085}{(H8804)} the voice{H6963} of my supplications{H8469} when I cried{H7768}{(H8763)} unto thee.

O love{H157}{(H8798)} the LORD{H3068}, all ye his saints{H2623}: for the LORD{H3068} preserveth{H5341}{(H8802)} the faithful{H539}{(H8803)}, and plentifully{H3499} rewardeth{H7999}{(H8764)} the proud{H1346} doer{H6213}{(H8802)}.
Be of good courage{H2388}{(H8798)}, and he shall strengthen{H553}{(H8686)} your heart{H3824}, all ye that hope{H3176}{(H8764)} in the LORD{H3068}.
